{-
    Various Types
-}


module Koncat.Types
where

import Control.Monad.State
import qualified Data.Map as Map
import System.Time
import System.IO

type Nick    = String
type Channel = String
type Flags   = Maybe [(String,Maybe String)]
type IRC     = StateT Bot IO

{-
Represents the Permission neccessary to call a Module
When 
-}
data Permission 
    = Admin
    | ANY
    | Privileged
    | Registered
    | UnRegistered
    deriving (Eq,Show,Ord)

data Bot = Bot { 
      socket    :: Handle
    , starttime :: ClockTime 
    , modCnt    :: Integer
    , aliasDB   :: [(String, String)]
    , userDB    :: Map.Map Nick Permission
    , channelDB :: [Channel]
}deriving(Show)

data GenericIRC = GenericIRC{
     user :: UserInfo
   , orig :: Channel
   , msg  :: [String]
} deriving (Show)

data UserInfo = UserInfo{
     name  :: Nick
   , rName :: Nick
   , vhost :: String
} deriving (Show, Eq)

data Handshake = Handshake{
     desc      :: String
   , funcs     :: [(String,String,String, Maybe [(Char, String)])]
   , author    :: String
} deriving (Show)

data IRCCommand = IRCCommand {
    qModule :: String
  , qFunc   :: String
  , qArgs   :: Maybe [String]
  , qFlags  :: Flags
} deriving (Show)

data ModuleCall = ModuleCall {
    path   :: FilePath
  , func   :: String  
  , args   :: Maybe [String]
  , dest   :: Channel
  , caller :: Nick 
  , flags  :: Flags
} deriving (Show, Eq)
